thread.title_full: Marc Anthony dating 21-year-old model Mariana Downing | Daily Mail Online

author: Rebecca Lawrence For Mailonline
title: Marc Anthony dating 21-year-old model Mariana Downing | Daily Mail Online
text: comments His divorce from wife number four, Shannon De Lima, was finalised on Monday. But it appears Marc Anthony, 48, has wasted no time moving on, as he is said to have been dating 21-year-old model Mariana Downing for a couple of months. Sources told TMZ the singer was 'immediately smitten' with the model after meeting at a dinner party. Scroll down for video Rebound? Marc Anthony, 48, is said to have been dating a 21-year-old model for a 'couple of months'. He finalised his divorce from his fourth wife on Monday He is said to have made a move immediately, with the pair exchanging numbers on the night. The site reports that Mariana has since traveled with him to one of his shows, and they've holidayed together in the Caribbean. MailOnline have contacted Marc's representatives for comment. 'Smitten': ,Marc is said to have met Mariana at a dinner party and was 'immediately smitten'. The pair are believed to have exchanged numbers on the same night Beach babe: It's been reported that Mariana has since traveled with Marc to one of his shows, and they've holidayed together in the Caribbean Marc filed for divorce from 28-year-old Shannon on December 16, with court documents citing that the marriage was 'irretrievably broken'. The couple - who wed November 2014 - said in a statement: 'After much consideration, we have mutually and amicably decided to end our two year marriage.' Before Shannon, Marc was married to Jennifer Lopez , and prior to that he was married to Dayanara Torres and Maria Von Ritchie Lopez. Split: Marc filed for divorce from 28-year-old Shannon on December 16, with court documents citing that the marriage was 'irretrievably broken' It's over: The couple - who wed November 2014 - said in a statement: 'After much consideration, we have mutually and amicably decided to end our two year marriage' The You Sang To Me hitmaker has four children from his previous relationships - including twins Emme and Maximillian, eight, with JLo. Jennifer and Marc wed in 2004, split in 2011 and finalized their divorce in 2014. In November, the pair sparked rumours of a reconciliation as they kissed on stage at the Latin Grammys. Former flame: The You Sang To Me hitmaker has four children from his previous relationships - including twins Emme and Maximillian, eight, with ex-wife Jennifer Lopez Share or comment on this article 133
